interface.name: org.freedesktop.ModemManager1.Sms
interface.tp:docstring: Defines operations and properties of a single SMS message.

method.name: Send
method.tp:docstring: If the message has not yet been sent, queue it for delivery.

property.name: State
property.tp:docstring: Describes the state of the message.

property.name: To
property.tp:docstring: Indicates the number to which the message is addressed.

property.name: Text
property.tp:docstring: Message text. When sending, if the text is larger than the limit of the technology or modem, the message will be broken into multiple parts or messages.

property.name: Smsc
property.tp:docstring: Indicates the SMS service center number. Always empty for 3GPP2/CDMA.

property.name: Validity
property.tp:docstring: Specifies when the SMS expires in the SMSC. Always 0 for 3GPP2/CDMA.

property.name: Timestamp
property.tp:docstring: Time message was received or was sent in ISO8601 format.

tp:enumvalue.tp:docstring: The message has been neither received nor yet sent.
The message is being received but is not yet complete.
The message received and is complete.
The message is queued for delivery.
